title: TRAMPLING MY ENEMIES - Total War: Arena Gameplay
description:
Total War: Arena - Hey guys today we are going to be checking out Total War Arena which is currently in closed beta. I will be playing as Arminius and control 3 units of Cavalry! Enjoy the Battles :D

Battle 1 - 1:32
Battle 2 - 13:16


JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

-----------------------------------------PA Merchandise---------------------------------------------
